title: Jennifer Aniston shares kiss with Ellen after admitting she doesn't smooch friends
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Jennifer Aniston has shared a smooch with Ellen DeGeneres after confessing to never having kissed a girl.

Friends star Jennifer turned the tables on the TV host on The Ellen Show in an interview set to air today (Monday), grilling the openly gay host about how often she kisses men after she was spotted giving Howard Stern a peck on the lips.

Unfazed, Ellen responded: ‘Why is everyone so shocked? I kiss guys! I kiss guys like that.

‘I don’t make out with guys, but I kiss guys on the lips.’

She then in turn asked Jennifer: ‘When was the last time you kissed a girl on the lips?’

Taking her time to think over her answer, Jen then responded: ‘I don’t kiss girls on the lips, no …’

Jennifer accepted Ellen’s offer of a kiss after admitting she doesn’t smooch her pals (Picture: YouTube/EllenTube)

Ellen, who has been married to Portia De Rossi since 2008, then leaned in to Jennifer to the screams of the audience, giving Jennifer the open to get a kiss too.

Jennifer then followed Ellen’s lead, and the couple kissed to applause and a lot of giggles.

‘That’s what they wanted to see; they’ve been wanting that for years!’ Ellen laughed.

Jennifer admitted she ‘got it’ after the quick peck (Picture: YouTube/EllenTube)

It appears that Jen took a note out of the Katy Perry handbook, kissed a girl and liked it as she told Ellen: ‘You have such soft lips!’

Ellen then bragged: ‘That’s why I do what I do!’

‘I get it!’ Jennifer responded.

Jennifer, 50, appeared on the show to promote her new series, The Morning Show, in which she stars alongside Steve Carell and Reese Witherspoon.

The show focuses on the aftermath of the MeToo movement on a news channel, as one of their anchors are unceremoniously fired after allegations were made against him.

The Morning Show launches 1 November on Apple TV.
